segments.text: I'd like to open a one-year time deposit account and a checking account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , if you'll please fill out these forms ... ( She hands the forms to the customer . ) There's a minimum initial deposit of $ 100 for the checking account , and a minimum deposit of $ 500 for the savings account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , here are the forms . Can I use traveler's checks to open the account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Just make them out to National Bank , and sign and date them .
segments.speaker: S2
